channel.title: Version 3.1 :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: 3.1.1 (2022-03-16) Enhancements [feature] i18n: add Korean translation #217 3.1.0 (2022-03-15) Enhancements [feature] notice: add icon parameter #212 [feature] mobile: remove breadcrumb ellipsis #211 Fixes [bug] theme: make storage of multiple Hugo sites on same server distinct #214 [bug] variant: switch breadcrumb color in Chrome #213 [bug] mobile: improve behavior of sidebar menu #210
